answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some links that may be a useful start to your research.
This is a sample position opening for volunteer services from Volunteer Match. 
http://www.volunteermatch.org/search/opp808378.jsp 
This blog post from Seeking Grant Money Today gives advice for how to handle volunteer grant writers.
http://thegrantplant.blogspot.com/2009/09/some-advice-about-volunteer-grant.html
This is a Grant Proposal Assistance packet from the Alabama Department of Economic and Community Affairs.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/9033/Grant_Proposal_Assistance
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Will Weber
text: I am looking at having our volunteer resourses do grant research and writing for City of Lake Oswego. Can any one share if they have done this? What kind of results? Pros and cons?
title: Volunteer Grant Writers
